#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
int main()
{
    ll t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        string str;
        ll f[123]={0},ans=0;
        cin>>str;
        ll i=0;
        while(str[i]!='\0')
        {
            f[str[i]]++;
            i++;
        }
        for(i=0;i<=122;i++)
        {
            ans+=((f[i]/2)+(f[i]%2));
        }
        cout<<ans<<endl;
    }
}
